fulltext:
With 7 years experiences in digital marketing, I quite understand how
digital impact on business and the process of digital transformation
nowadays. I hope to have change to contribute in sustainable businesses
like education, health or human-centered technology.
Digital Marketing Manager
CONTACT INFO
Hoangnam4487@gmail.com
0938 04.04.8 7
Q9, HCM
DOB: 04/04/1987
EDUCATION
Information Technology
at HCM Bach Khoa University
Applied Marketing
Professional
at BMG Education
Google Advertising & Analytics
at Google Academy
SKILL
Digital Marketing
Strategic Planning
SEO SEM
Web Analytics
UX/UI
Project Management
WORK EXPERIENCE
DIGITAL MARKETING STRATEGY CONSULTANT (Part-time)
1/2019 – 7/2019
Project: G.Study – Study Abroad Consulting (4 months)
G. Study is a new and fast growing company in study aboard industry
where I have change to build marketing strategy from the beginning.
Achievement:
-
Marketing strategy in short term, middle term and long term
-
Establish a complete digital marketing lead generation process
-
Acquire 300 leads with 38% sales qualified.
-
Operate successfully 4 offline events.
Project: Modoho – Rental Service For Expats (3 months)
Modoho is a start-up company in real estate with young and passionate
team, where I contribute my knowledge in SEO to help them improve in
search visibility.
Achievement:
-
SEO strategy and action plan for 1 year.
-
A complete on page SEO optimized website.
-
Full SEO training package and one SEO intern trained.
STRATEGIC CONSULTANT (Part-time)
Goha.vn – Digital Marketing Agency
1/2019 – 7/2019
After transfer company to partner I continue working as a strategic
consultant and account manager:
-
Working with BOD about company orientation.
-
Support current customer and prepare proposal for new contract
-
Restructure digital marketing services
NGUYỄN HOÀNG NAM
“ Life is simple ”
-
Human resource training and development
FOUNDER, DIGITAL MARKETING MANAGER
Goha.vn – Digital Marketing Agency
02/2016 – 12/2018 (2 yrs. 11 mos.)
Goha is a performance-based marketing agency focus in SME segment.
Goha work with customer as an out source marketing department
which build marketing strategy, implement and optimize.
Major Responsibility:
-
Marketing strategic planning for customers.
-
Manage operation team to archive marketing goals.
-
Marketing solution research & development
-
Work with BOD to brain storm strategic direction
Other tasks:
-
Building company culture
-
Motivate employee
-
Human resource training and development
Some Hi-light Projects & Achievement:
-
VUS – Top English Center in Vietnam: Thousands of parent’s
submissions form.
-
Ketnoitieudung.vn – Top 3 tools distributer in HCM: Revenue
improve 300 % after 2 years
-
Tugo.vn – Top 5 travel agent in HCM: double SEO traffic in one year
PERFORMANCE MARKETING LEAD
Alpha Circle – Performance Marketing Agency
09/2014 – 12/2015 (1 yrs. 4 mos.)
Alpha Circle is a marketing agency focus in automobile industry. The
company work with car distributer and also car dealer
Responsibility:
-
In charge of SEO, Content Planning, SEM, Facebook Marketing,
prepare performance plan and presentation when necessary.
Achievement:
-
After 1-year Alpha Crile acquired by Square Group
SEO LEADER (SELF MANAGEMENT)
At Tiki.Vn – Ecommerce
9/2013 – 9/2014 (1 yrs.)
In charge of SEO & organic traffic strategy for Tiki.vn website.
Responsibility:
-
Keyword research & planning.
-
Optimize Tiki.vn website for user & search engine.
-
Ranking improves.
-
Building content marketing plan for Tiki.vn/tu-van
-
Building internship team to support SEO.
Achievement:
-
Help Tiki increase 100% traffic after 12 months. On top on thousands
of keywords
REFERENCE
-
Mr. Bang (line manager in IDM) : 090 888 1581
-
Mrs. Phương (G.Study CEO): 090 647 7720
-
Ms. Yến (Goha CEO): 091 910 0075
